context.p: On the Define for customer page, you can define or update the price model for a selected service and customer.

You have selected a service that is charged for using the platform's native billing system. This means that you are responsible for defining whether and how much the specified customer is charged for using subscriptions to the service.
To define or update a customer price model:

info.p: If your service is free of charge, proceed with Step 7, else with Step 2.If you define a customer price model with costs, make sure that the corresponding service price model defines costs as well. Otherwise, the platform does not allow for managing payment types.

taskbody.result: After activating the service, the price model is available to the selected customer. It takes effect for all new subscriptions of the customer.
